eu_initiatives: We are as national trade union roof organisation represented in management boards of all tripartite European level bodies (Eurofound, EU-OSHA, CEDEFOP), and in all tripartite advisory committees to European Commission.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Committee for Vocational Training#X01803#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1803#Member#C#Comité consultatif pour la sécurité et la santé sur le lieu de travail#X01211#MAASIKAS Aija#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1211#Member#B#Employees/workers#Intérêt des représentants des travailleurs
membership: The EAKL is full member of the ETUC.
goals__remit: The Estonian Trade Union Confederation is the national roof organisation for Estonian trade unions. It unites 18 sectoral trade union federations in health care, transport, public services, trade and commerce, industry etc sectors.
relevant_communication: The EAKL is national level roof organisation for Estonian trade unions.
